name: Extra Small Time Bonus
description: Adds a small amount of time to your clock. Most common card in the deck. Good for steady progress.

name: Small Time Bonus
description: Adds a decent amount of time to your clock. A reliable mid-value card for building your time bank.

name: Medium Time Bonus
description: Adds a substantial amount of time to your clock. Less common but worth holding onto for the right moment.

name: Large Time Bonus
description: Adds a large amount of time to your clock. Rare and valuable - use strategically for maximum impact.

name: Extra Large Time Bonus
description: Adds the maximum time bonus to your clock. The rarest and most valuable card. Save for critical moments or difficult challenges.

name: Randomize
description: Shuffles your current hand into random order. Use when you want to reset card positions or change your hand layout.

name: Veto
description: Cancels or rejects the current question or challenge. Powerful defensive card to skip unfavorable situations.

name: Duplicate
description: Creates a copy of another card in your hand. Choose wisely to duplicate your best time bonus or save a useful action card.

name: Move
description: Allows you to reposition a card to a different slot in your hand. The rarest action card for strategic hand management.

name: Discard 1 Draw 2
description: Discard one card from your hand and draw two new cards. Good for refreshing weak cards and expanding options.

name: Discard 2 Draw 3
description: Discard two cards from your hand and draw three new cards. Powerful card cycling for when you need fresh options quickly.
